alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cochise County through 945 PM MST... At 900 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bisbee, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bisbee and Naco. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 338 and 356. Route 92 between mile markers 347 and 355. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
